articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: 'Told my wife that Australia series could become my last': Ashwin - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Speaking in an interview a week after that WTC final call by Indian team management, Ashwin opened up on his knee injury during the Bangladesh Test series. | Cricket
articles.content: The World Test Championship snub was a significant blow to Ravichandran Ashwin's illustrious Test career. Despite 474 Test wickets, among top-10 in the world, in a career spanning over a decade and w… [+3652 chars]
